abstract.t: This document reproduces the content of the ITU-T Study Group 16 White Document draft of H.248 Annex J, which is scheduled for decision in Geneva in November 2000. H.248 Annex J provides the Dynamic Tone Generation package. This document is submitted for IETF comment prior to ITU-T decision, in accordance with procedures currently being negotiated between ITU-T Study Group and ISOC on behalf of the IETF.
